description: "This colourful map of Asia is illustrated with drawings of Asian people wearing traditional clothing, including a man and woman from Java in Southeast Asia, and drawings of important ports such as Bantan (Banten) situated at the western end of Java."
title: "A new plaine and exact map of Asia / discribed by N.I. Vischer and rendered into English with the habits of the countries and manner of the cheife citties ; printed colloured and sould by Iohn Overton at the White Horse neere the fountaine tavern without Newgate."
